title: Horizontal Scroll
description: You'll find all types of Accordion which is both use for HTML, REACTJS and NEXTJS

body.raw:
Preview Code ```tsx {23,28,32-38} // @ts-nocheck 'use client' import Image from 'next/image' import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import { animate, scroll, spring } from 'motion' import { ReactLenis } from 'lenis/react' export default function HorizontalScroll(): JSX.Element { const ulRef = useRef() useEffect(() => { const items = document.querySelectorAll('li') if (ulRef.current) { const controls = animate( ulRef.current, { transform: ['none', `translateX(-${items.length - 1}00vw)`], }, { easing: spring() } ) scroll(controls, { target: document.querySelector('section') }) } const segmentLength = 1 / items.length items.forEach((item, i) => { const header = item.querySelector('h2') scroll(animate([header], { x: [800, -800] }), { target: document.querySelector('section'), offset: [ [i * segmentLength, 1], [(i + 1) * segmentLength, 0], ], }) }) }, []) return (
